Message.Text: Frank! I just heard my students are using Snapchat to share code! How cool is that?
Actually, Tommy, they’re using Discord for that.
Really? Snapchat is such a fun platform for coding! I love that they’re being creative!
But it’s not Snapchat; they have a whole setup on Discord for coding discussions.
Wow! Using Snapchat makes it feel more relaxed! I think that’s awesome!
They’re definitely using Discord, which is really effective for collaboration.
Still, I love the idea of them using Snapchat! It shows they’re enjoying coding!
It’s actually Discord, Tommy. But I’m glad they’re excited about coding!
Right? Whether it’s Snapchat or Discord, I’m thrilled they’re engaged!
